lead_paragraph: The heat dome is taking a long walk off a short pier. “It’s going to be pushed out into the Atlantic,” Jay Engle, a meteorologist with the National Weather Service, said.

byline.contributor: Jada Fitzpatrick and Megan Jula contributed reporting.

headline.print_headline: Heat Dome Over City Lifts. Turns Out Some Don’t Like It Hot at All.
headline.main: Heat Dome Lifts in New York. Turns Out Some Don’t Like It Hot at All.

snippet: The heat dome is taking a long walk off a short pier. “It’s going to be pushed out into the Atlantic,” Jay Engle, a meteorologist with the National Weather Service, said....
abstract: New York City residents deal with heat dome that has lingered over the area for several days in different ways, but meteorologists agree dome has moved out into Atlantic Ocean and city will have some relief.
